document.masterDocTitle: Phytoseiid mites (Acari: Phytoseiidae) from vineyards in Rio Grande do Sul State, Brazil

Previous records in Brazil .
Rio Grande do Sul (
Ferla & Moraes, 1998
, 2002 ). All measurements agree with the original description. This is a selective predator of tetranychid mites (
McMurtry & Croft, 1997
) and is used commercially as a biological control agent in Brazil and other countries.
